document_data.name: Andros Calaudra
document_data.mainbody: '''Andros Calaudra''' was the master of [[House Calaudra]] in [[Melvaunt]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1372 DR, Andros's daughter [[Kara Calaudra]] went on adventures with some friends and disappeared. Lord [[Woarsten Nanther]] hired an adventuring party to find the boys.
document_data.Personality: Andros supported the relationship between Kara and [[Elaint Marsk]] but had warned his daughter to not fully trust full-blooded [[human]]s. (He himself was a [[half-elf]].) Like all the Calaudras, he was a wizard.
